# Faraz Hameed

![Faraz Hameed's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FFaraz_Hameed_361ad89e76.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)

# Faraz Hameed

Solution Engineer

Faraz helps organizations navigate the complexities of modern data architecture. In an era of exploding vendor options and rising data costs, he guides technical teams through platform decisions that align with their needs and optimize their investments.

His experience spans organizations of all sizes, from growing enterprises to Fortune 500 companies where he helps technical teams cut through marketing buzz to make pragmatic architectural decisions. He partners with technical leaders to evaluate modern architecture approaches that scale cost-effectively and deliver real business value.

Through architecture workshops and technical discovery sessions, he brings proven practices and lessons learned from numerous enterprise implementations. This collaborative approach helps teams avoid costly missteps and build data architectures that stand the test of time.

When heâ€™s not helping teams navigate data architecture decisions, he finds balance and fulfillment in his roles as a husband and father, along with his passion for food, automobiles, and technology.
